title: Hybrid Physical and Virtual Laboratory Design: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for professional learners (medical/legal/technical). Integrates physical/virtual laboratories using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the complementary characteristics of physical/virtual labs for physics and engineering problem-solving with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply three or more engineering epistemic practices to project deliverables through blended-mode experimental design.
Learners can write reports using conceptual reasoning in virtual labs and physical manipulation skills in physical labs, based on experimental data analysis.

resources: Physics lab kit (jar testing equipment, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
